Text:
Thank you for the upload Chris-Aksel ! 

easy instal - mount + auto instaler and working as it should !!!

thx a lot
I have a problem I installed then when I launch the game its a minimized window and it stays black and nothing happens so i have to ctrl alt delete it? anyone help please.
I hope you didn't inject any R.A.T in one of your .exe files.... Or else it can't be trusted.

Those having difficulties to proceed to load the car mission(hot pursuit) kindly
change the language from english to russian.
After you beat the level,then change it back to english. It's working for me!


[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeDanger Close GamesMedal of Honor Warfighter]

"GDFBinary"="C:GamesMedal of Honor WarfighterGDFBinary_en_US.dll"

"Locale"="en_us"


to

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeDanger Close GamesMedal of Honor Warfighter]

"GDFBinary"="C:GamesMedal of Honor WarfighterGDFBinary_ru_RU.dll"

"Locale"="ru_RU"
